text: oba dæhæmi dæya kirimata ho parisuddhavantayin bavata pat vimata ho minisun atare samadanaya kara tæbimata ho obata badhavak vasayen pat viya hæki andamata (oba karana) obage divrumata allahva ænda noganu. allah (divrumata) savan denneku vasayenda, (sithi æti dæya) hondin danneku vasayenda sitinneya
